Classes/SceneAuthoringController.html.name: SceneAuthoringController
Classes/SceneAuthoringController.html.abstract: Provides the flow for authoring an AR Annotation Scene using UIKit. Used to create the content for the cards, select an anchor Image, and position the entities in their real world locations. Publishing the scene using Mobile Services with an SAPURLSession.

Structs/CardImage.html#/s:7FioriAR9CardI.name: id
Structs/CardImage.html#/s:7FioriAR9CardI.abstract: used when loading a card specific to a scene from SAP Mobile Services

Structs/CodableCardItem.html.abstract: A concrete type of CardItemModel which conforms to Codable. Used for card authoring scena

Structs/ScreenAnnotation.html.name: ScreenAnnotation
Structs/ScreenAnnotation.html.abstract: Wrapper struct for the CardItem : CardItemModel, MarkerState, and the entity which backs real world position of the marker.

Structs/CardImage.html.name: CardImage
Structs/CardImage.html.abstract: Representing the detail/cover image of a carda

Structs/VectorStrategy.html#/s:7FioriAR1.name: cardContents
Structs/VectorStrategy.html#/s:7FioriAR1.abstract: An array of CardItem : CardItemModel which represent what will be displayed in the default CardView

Structs/VectorStrategy.html#/s:7FioriAR1.abstract: Image to be converted to ARReferenceImage and added to ARConfiguration for discovery, can be nil if detecting an object Anchor

Structs/VectorStrategy.html#/s:7FioriAR1.abstract: The width of the image in meters

Structs/VectorStrategy.html#/s:7FioriAR1.abstract: Constructor for loading annotations using an Image as an anchor with a Reality Composer scene

Structs/VectorStrategy.html#/s:7FioriAR1.abstract: Constructor for loading annotations using Data from a JSON Array

Structs/VectorStrategy.html#/s:7FioriAR1.abstract: Loads [ScreenAnnotation] for cardContents and creates an ModelEntity for the cards with a position available

Structs/UsdzFileStrategy.html#/s:7FioriA.name: cardContents

Structs/UsdzFileStrategy.html#/s:7FioriA.abstract: Constructor for loading annotations using an Image as an anchor with a Reality Composer scene

Structs/UsdzFileStrategy.html#/s:7FioriA.name: init(jsonData:anchorImage:physicalWidth:usdzFilePath:)
Structs/UsdzFileStrategy.html#/s:7FioriA.abstract: Constructor for loading annotations using Data from a JSON Array

Structs/UsdzFileStrategy.html#/s:7FioriA.name: load(with:)
Structs/UsdzFileStrategy.html#/s:7FioriA.abstract: Loads the USDZ Files Scene and extracts the Entities pairing them with the data that corresponds to their ID into a list of ScreenAnnotation

Protocols/AsyncAnnotationLoadingStrategy.name: CardItem
Protocols/AsyncAnnotationLoadingStrategy.abstract: associated type of this protocol needs to conform to CardItemModel and Codable

Protocols/AnnotationLoadingStrategy.html.name: CardItem
Protocols/AnnotationLoadingStrategy.html.abstract: associated type of this protocol needs to conform to CardItemModel

Protocols/AnnotationLoadingStrategy.html.name: AnnotationLoadingStrategy
Protocols/AnnotationLoadingStrategy.html.abstract: Protocol which defines the data a strategy needs to provide a [ScreenAnnotation]

Protocols/AsyncAnnotationLoadingStrategy.name: AsyncAnnotationLoadingStrategy
Protocols/AsyncAnnotationLoadingStrategy.abstract: Protocol which defines the data an asynchronous strategy needs to provide a [ScreenAnnotation]

Structs/RCProjectStrategy.html.name: RCProjectStrategy
Structs/RCProjectStrategy.html.abstract: A loading strategy that uses the RealityComposer app. After creating the Reality Composer scene, the entities in the scene correlate to a real world location relative to the image or object anchor.

Structs/RealityFileStrategy.html.name: RealityFileStrategy
Structs/RealityFileStrategy.html.abstract: A loading strategy that uses the RealityComposer app. After creating the Reality Composer scene, the entities in the scene correlate to a real world location relative to the image or object anchor.

Classes/ServiceStrategy.html.name: ServiceStrategy
Classes/ServiceStrategy.html.abstract: A loading strategy that makes a network fetch request to Mobile Services to return the data necessary to display an AR Annotation Scene.

Structs/UsdzFileStrategy.html.name: UsdzFileStrategy
Structs/UsdzFileStrategy.html.abstract: A loading strategy that uses the RealityComposer app. After creating the Reality Composer scene, the entities in the scene correlate to a real world location relative to the image or object anchor.

Structs/VectorStrategy.html.name: VectorStrategy
Structs/VectorStrategy.html.abstract: A loading strategy that uses the Vectors provided by the CardItemModels PositionComponent to position the Entities relative to the anchor Image.

Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.name: sceneRoot
Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.abstract: The Root Entity with the entities that back the real world positions of the Annotations as children

Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.name: configureSession(with:options:)
Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.abstract: Set the configuration for the ARView’s session with run options

Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.name: addChild(for:preservingWorldTransform:)
Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.abstract: Adds the given entity which conforms to HasCollision as a child of the sceneRoot

Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.name: addAnchor(anchor:)
Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.abstract: Adds a Entity which conforms to HasAnchoring to the arView.scene

Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.name: removeAnchor(anchor:)
Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.abstract: Removes the specified HasAnchoring from the scene

Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.name: findEntity(named:)
Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.abstract: Finds Entity in the scene from the given name, returns nil if the entity does not exist in the scene

Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.name: addReferenceImage(for:_:with:configuration:resetImages:)
Classes/ARManager.html#/s:7FioriAR9ARMan.abstract: Adds an ARReferenceImage to the configuration for the session to discover

Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.name: annotations
Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.abstract: An array of ScreenAnnotations which are displayed in the scene contain the marker position and their card contents

Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.name: currentAnnotation
Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.abstract: The ScreenAnnotation that is focused on in the scene. The CardView and MarkerView will be in their selected states

Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.name: load(loadingStrategy:)
Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.abstract: Loads a strategy into the arModel and sets annotations member from the returned [ScreenAnnotation]

Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.name: loadAsync(loadingStrategy:)
Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.abstract: Loads an asynchronous strategy into the arModel and sets annotations member from the returned [ScreenAnnotation]

Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.name: session(_:didAdd:)
Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.abstract: Tells the delegate that one or more anchors have been added to the session.

Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.name: session(_:didUpdate:)
Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.abstract: Provides a newly captured camera image and accompanying AR information to the delegate.

Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.name: session(_:didUpdate:)
Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html#/s:7F.abstract: Updates the anchorEntities when the underlying ARAnchors update

Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html.name: ARAnnotationViewModel
Classes/ARAnnotationViewModel.html.abstract: ViewModel for managing an ARCards experience. Provides and sets the annotation data/anchor locations to the view and the flow for the discovery animations.

Classes/ARManager.html.name: ARManager
Classes/ARManager.html.abstract: Stores and manages common functional for the ARView

Enums/SceneEditing.html#/s:7FioriAR12Sce.name: published(sceneID:)
Enums/SceneEditing.html#/s:7FioriAR12Sce.abstract: the scene was either created or updated remotely

Structs/SceneAuthoringView.html.name: SceneAuthoringView
Structs/SceneAuthoringView.html.abstract: Provides the flow for authoring an AR Annotation Scene. Used to create the content for the cards, select an anchor Image, and position the entities in their real world locations. Publishing the scene using Mobile Services with an SAPURLSession.

Enums/SceneIdentifyingAttribute.html.name: SceneIdentifyingAttribute
Enums/SceneIdentifyingAttribute.html.abstract: Unique attribute and its value identifiying a scene stored in SAP Mobile Services

Structs/ARAnnotationsView.html#/s:7Fiori.name: scanLabel
Structs/ARAnnotationsView.html#/s:7Fiori.abstract: View Builder for a custom Scanning View. After the Image/Object has been discovered there is a 3 second delay until the ContentView displays Markers and Cards

Structs/ARAnnotationsView.html.name: ARAnnotationsView
Structs/ARAnnotationsView.html.abstract: Content View which displays the card and marker views after a discovery flow for a single Image in the scene after the discoveryFlowHasFinished has been set to True. Only displays the views which are set to isVisible. Cards and Markers are initially set to isVisible.

Structs/ARScanView.html.name: ARScanView
Structs/ARScanView.html.abstract: Scanning View which displays a collapsable image to display for anchor detection. The anchor is still detectable when uncollapsed and the View will fade out after detection.

Structs/MarkerView.html.name: MarkerView
Structs/MarkerView.html.abstract: A MarkerView to display the location of an Annotation backed by a real world location

Structs/CardView.html.name: CardView
Structs/CardView.html.abstract: A CardView to display data which maps to an annotation represent in the real world.
